artist: Designer: Robert Lazzarini; Manufacturer: cup and saucer by Franz Collection, Inc.; Manufacturer: spoon by Image Imports
description: teacup and saucer decorated with blue flowers and silver trim, and distorted into undulating shapes; distorted spoon fits curves of saucer
markings: on bottom of cup and saucer, in blue: [2003 PETER NORTON FAMILY Christmas Project/ (surrounding blue flower)]; on bottom of cup and saucer, in purple: [N1230]; on bottom of cup and saucer, in black: [MADE IN CHINA]
title: teacup
